sentences: TDG System Integration is looking for new colleagues for our team, who will support us as Software Developer with following tasks;
Develop quality software and web applications
Analyze and maintain existing software applications
Ensure high quality documentation of the software
Net, C#, WCF, SQL, HTML5, PHP
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
Strong analytical and communication skills with a result-oriented and self-motivated profile
